lines.text: Oh now Clint, you ought to trust me better than that.
I trust you, Spang, and you trust me, but we just can't trust each other.
Too bad Clint isn't married to the princess. She's make a fine lookin' widow.
You sure called the turn on Spang.
All you gotta do is think like a corkscrew.
You really work hard at hating, don't you, Morrison?
I don't like to kill my friends, Clint.
That makes us even, Spang, I'm kind of against dying.
Your guns have gotten too fast and too sudden. And from what I hear about your reputation, they have gotten a lot faster and suddener in the last two years.
Well, he sure wasn't bluffing about them barricades, or them gunhands he's got behind them.
Gunhands? There ain't ten men in the whole town that knows which end of the gun does the shooting.
Yeah, well, I'd sure hate to find out by having them practicing on me!
Listen to me! I'll tell you when you get shot and when not! You understand that? Don't forget it!
You make thim draw first. You understand that? I want him dead legal.
He won't be so big. He'll be cut down to size before this night is over. Load up!
Well, Spang, I never thought I's see you twice in the same day.
I don't figure it will ever happen agian... seeing how you ain't got long to live.
